thread.title: The 17 best Twitter reactions to Phil Jones' shocking performance for Manchester United against Rostov
thread.title_full: The 17 best Twitter reactions to Phil Jones' shocking performance for Manchester United against Rostov

author: Mark Jones
title: The 17 best Twitter reactions to Phil Jones' shocking performance for Manchester United against Rostov
text:
Sport The 17 best Twitter reactions to Phil Jones' shocking performance for Manchester United against Rostov The Red Devils secured a decent draw in the first leg of their Europa League last-16 tie in Russia, but that didn't stop their rubber-faced defender from getting one almighty trolling Share LOOK AT HIS FACE! (Photo: REUTERS) Share Get Manchester United FC   Thank you for subscribing! Could   
Manchester United's 1-1 draw in the first leg of their Europa League last-16 tie against Rostov was a pretty decent result - especially given the Russian side's pitch - but it could have been a whole lot better. 
After Henrikh Mkhitaryan had given the Red Devils the lead , an equaliser from Rostov forward Aleksandr Bukharov pegged Jose Mourinho's side back, meaning that the Portuguese was forced to accept that his side wouldn't be able to take a victory into the second leg in Manchester in a week's time. 
And with not much else to talk about following what was a pretty dull game - Barca v PSG it certainly wasn't - United fans were left to debate the performance of a man who allowed Bukharov in for that equalising goal. A rare positive moment (Photo: John Peters) Oh, Phil (Photo: REUTERS) 
Phil Jones, playing in an unfamiliar United back three, didn't exactly have the best of nights - even if he did find time to full another funny face. 
And social media wasn't kind to him. You horrible lot. Should Manchester United sell Phil Jones? 1000+ VOTES SO FAR
